Job Description: Roles and ResponsibilitiesJob Description:• Formulate steps required to develop program, using structured analysis and design.• Take complete ownership of the job assigned to you and ensure the deliverance of a quality job within the specified time line to your seniors• Take initiative in assisting your seniors and peers in project execution and management over and above the tasks assigned to you.Desired Profile for PL/SQL Developer:• Graduate with 5+ years of extensive experience on Oracle backend and PL/SQL with any other GUIs/Front-end tool• Knowledge in Performance tuning is mandatory• Experience in JAVA is desirable• Exposure to tools like Toad and VSS•Project experience related to following domains Investment Management \ Wealth Management \ Financial Services \ Capital Markets (Hedge Funds, Alternative Investment, Portfolio Accounting, Investment Operations) would be an added advantage• Good communication skill
